snippet.title: Rex And The UFO [FULL GAME, ENGLISH SUBTITLES]
snippet.description:
Rex And The UFO is the second part of Adventures of Rex. It includes many references. mostly to Star Wars film. It's the first time Moles The Mole appears as the main character of the game as he was just a third plan role in Rex And The Pirate's Treasure.

Description from the box (translated):

Somewhere in a galaxy far away... on a planet where a mole says goodnight... a mysterious Henperor builds a mighty egg with which he wants to conquer the entire universe...

Meanwhile Rex, after solving the mystery of the Pirates' Treasure, returns home... Here he learns that the hens from his yard have been abducted by UFOs... Reksio decides to save the hens and sets off in pursuit of the cosmic kidnappers.

Why have hens just been abducted?

Who the mysterious Henperor really is?

What is the lebiodka from the planet Henakis used for?

Is love enough to break down walls?

You will learn everything by accompanying Rex on another expedition full of surprises and passionate adventures...

0:00 - Intro
1:14 - Episode 1 - Invasion
4:37 - Episode 2 - Arrangements
10:10 - Episode 3 - The Journey
16:09 - Episode 4 - The Moleons
30:20 - Episode 5 - Goobler
49:31 - Episode 6 - Henakis
1:05:09 - Episode 7 - To egg
1:09:28 - The Last Episode - The Egg Stinks
1:20:28 - Outro

English subtitles were created by Xelo.
Romanian subtitles were created by Quantum.

Other useful links:
Kret Kretes Records on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KretKretesRecords
Official Reksio Forum: http://www.przygodyreksia.aidemmedia.pl/pliki/kretes/forum/reksioforum/
Adventures of Rex Hub: https://www.przygody-reksia.pl/
Site with all games available to download (all available languages): https://www.pobierzreksia.pl/
Discord Adventures Of Rex: https://discord.gg/WKz6qwEzeX
Reksiopedia: https://przygodyreksia.fandom.com/wiki/Strona_g%C5%82%C3%B3wna

The game was created by Aidem Media.
